overview: Rooster Teeth Shorts is a series of short comedic films put together by Rooster Teeth Productions and starring various Rooster Teeth cast members. They are released intermittently year-round to provide content even when Red vs. Blue is not in production.
tagline: From the guys that brought you Red vs. Blue comes an office comedy that's not safe for work.
title: Rooster Teeth Shorts: Volume 1
